short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Online playground for Jade, CSS, and JavaScript

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
★ Compile Jade templates to HTML and preview the result with syntax highlighting. 
★ Start coding immediately without having to set up a boilerplate Jade file with body and head tags
★ Convert HTML to Jade with the built-in HTML to Jade converter
★ View compiled Stylus CSS side-by-side
★ Hover over highlighted CSS to bring up tooltips
